HotelSolution.name: Hilton Garden Inn Las Vegas Strip South

Content.hotel:Description: The Hilton Garden Inn Las Vegas Strip South hotel is located on "The Strip" on South Las Vegas Blvd. and 2.5 Miles South of Mandalay Bay. Complimentary shuttle to and from McCarran International Airport, Mandalay Bay and Town Square is provided by the Hilton Garden Inn Las Vegas, NV hotel. We're also within walking distance to Las Vegas' Largest Outlet Mall.Close to Las Vegas Attractions without the DistractionsPerfectly located, the Hilton Garden Inn Las Vegas, Nevada hotel is close to the Attractions without the Distractions. We're only minutes away from the new Town Square shopping center, the Las Vegas' Largest Outlet Mall, UNLV, Thomas & Mack Center and Mandalay Bay Convention Center.During your stay with us at the Hilton Garden Inn Strip South hotel in Las Vegas, you can kick back and relax while paying less:* Complimentary wireless high-speed Internet access "Wi-Fi"* Complimentary Fitness Center* Complimentary Business center with remote access printing* In room high-definition LCD TV* No access fees on local, calling cards and toll-free phone calls under 60 minutesWe offer complimentary high-speed Internet access in all guestrooms and public areas. The Great American Grill Restaurant and lounge are what you may need after a hard day of work or play.The restaurant serves breakfast and dinner with the lounge open in the evening. The Hilton Garden Inn Strip South hotel in Las Vegas, NV has an outdoor pool with whirlpool, 3,280 square feet of meeting space, a fitness center and a guest laundry service.*****Everything. Right where you need it. ****

HotelSolution.name: La Quinta Inn & Suites Las Vegas RedRock/Summerlin

Content.hotel:Description:
The La Quinta Inn & Suites Las Vegas - Red Rock / Summerlin was recently named a 2012 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence award winner!
NEW! Samsung Flat-panel TVs with 60 channels of HD programming. Easy-access Plug-and-Play feature makes it simple to connect electronics.
The 100% non-smoking La Quinta Inn & Suites Red Rock/Summerlin is located at the gateway to Summerlin, Blue Diamond, and Red Rock National Park.
The world-famous Las Vegas Strip is located approximately 10 miles away. The hotel is located within walking distance of many restaurants and an 18 screen movie theater. We are near the Red Rock Station Resort & Casino, the Suncoast Hotel and Casino, and Tivoli Village at Queensridge.
Located near Summerlin, we are convenient to a multitude of golf courses including Angels Park, TPC Summerlin, and Badlands. Other nearby attractions include the Las Vegas Convention Center, the Fremont Street Experience, the Kellogg/Zaher Sports Complex, and the Darling Tennis Complex. The La Quinta Red Rock/Summerlin is also located close to the Bank of America, Citigroup, Capital One, and Expedia Call Centers as well as the new Linq360 Innovation Center.
After a long day, relax in our 24 hour outdoor heated pool and hot tub, open year-round or break a sweat in our fitness center. Stay connected with free wireless high-speed Internet access from your guest room or use our 24-hour business center.
Our spacious comfortable rooms come with many amenities including a 37" Flat Panel TV with over 60 High - Definition channels. 42" Flat Panel Televisions are available in our Spa Suites. Guest rooms also include microwave, refrigerator, hair dryers, and satellite TV. Enjoy our delicious Free Bright Side BreakfastTM served fresh every morning. Special relocation and weekly rates are available for our long-term travelers.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: Executive queen pillowtop bed nonsmoking free wifi free breakfast coffeemaker iron hairdryer

HotelSolution.name: Ravella at Lake Las Vegas

Content.hotel:Description: A Mediterranean-inspired oasis in the Southwestern desert, Lake Las Vegas offers world-class golf, spa, and dining on the banks of the nation's largest man-made lake. Venture off-shore for a sightseeing cruise or gondola ride or head to the casinos and restaurants of the dazzling Las Vegas Strip for endless thrills.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: Luxurious room with two double beds and views of mojave desert

HotelSolution.name: SpringHill Suites by Marriott Las Vegas Henderson

Content.hotel:Description: Welcome to the newest all suite hotel near the Las Vegas strip/ Henderson/Green Valley area! SpringHill Suites by Marriott is perfect for those who want the action without the distraction! Located just 10 miles from Las Vegas McCarran International Airport (LAS) and all the excitement of the Las Vegas strip. The perfect Henderson hotel, with easy access to Regis University and University of Southern Nevada. The Galleria Mall and The District at Green Valley are nearby to satisfy your shopping urge and the Henderson Pavilion offers concerts and events year-round. Enjoy all the noise and excitement in nearby Las Vegas, with casinos galore, and events like the SEMA Show, and then come back to your clean and quiet Henderson guest suite. Business travelers will especially enjoy the large work space and complimentary high-speed Internet access, and families will love the hot breakfast, extra room and indoor pool. Whatever the reason for your travels, SpringHill Suites has everything you need or want!

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: 2 Queen, sofabed, mini-fridge, microwave, 400sq ft 36sqm-600sqft 54sqm, living sitting area, wi reless internet, complimentary, wired internet,

HotelSolution.name: Residence Inn by Marriott Las Vegas Henderson/Green Valley

Content.hotel:Description: Get away from it all at the Residence Inn Las Vegas Henderson/Green Valley Hotel. After exploring the fabulous Vegas Strip, come relax in our Henderson hotel suites. Perfect for an extended stay, our hotel is located in a peaceful location, just a seven mile shuttle ride to The Strip. Our location puts you close to the famous Hoover Dam, Lake Mead and the campus of UNLV. You can relax at our outdoor pool and whirlpool, cook out at our outdoor BBQ picnic area or workout in our on-site fitness center complete with cardio equipment and free weights. Enjoy our complimentary hot breakfast buffet and a free light dinner at our nightly Manager's Reception Monday through Wednesday. Each of our extended-stay suites offers a fully-equipped kitchen and separate living and sleeping areas. Business travelers will love our well-lit desks, ergonomically-designed chairs and free high-speed Internet. Come visit our pet-friendly Residence Inn Henderson Hotel and experience first-class service in the exciting Las Vegas area.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: 1 Queen, sofabed, fully equipped kitchen, micro wave, 425sqft 38sqm, living sitting area, dinin g area, wireless internet, complimentary, wired

HotelSolution.name: Renaissance Las Vegas Hotel

Content.hotel:Description: Discover a dramatic departure from traditional Las Vegas hotels, with a quietly cool boutique experience at the Renaissance Las Vegas luxury hotel. Just blocks from the famous Las Vegas Strip and adjacent to the Convention Center, this contemporary Las Vegas hotel is the largest smoke-free, non-gaming hotel in the area. A fresh, new approach to sleek style and deluxe accommodations offer travelers the excitement of a Las Vegas luxury hotel near the Strip, as well as a peaceful retreat after an action-packed day. Modern design elements blend seamlessly with innovative technological enhancements, creating a cutting-edge mix of distinctive private spaces alongside elegant corporate and social venues. Indulge in a delectable dining experience at our Las Vegas, Nevada hotel in the trendy atmosphere of ENVY The Steakhouse with an exclusive dining package. Escape to the Entertainment Capital of the World and rediscover how subtly sophisticated a hotel in Las Vegas, Nevada can be at the Renaissance Las Vegas hotel.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: Deluxe room, 1 king, 395sqft 36sqm, wireless in ternet for a fee, wired internet for a fee, cof fee tea maker, 37in 94cm lcd tv

HotelSolution.name: The Westin Casuarina Hotel & Spa, Las Vegas

Content.hotel:Description: The Westin Casuarina Hotel and Spa Las Vegas is located steps away from the famous Las Vegas "Strip" and nearby mega-resorts. Our upscale hotel includes the Hibiscus Spa, a 20,000 square feet casino, an outdoor year around swimming pool, Starbuck's, a full service restaurant and luxurious rooms where you'll find Westin's signature Heavenly Beds. Our hotel is centrally situated just 1 1/2 miles from the McCarran Airport, 1 mile from the Las Vegas Convention Center, and a block and a half from the Las Vegas Strip. A Resort Fee of $15 per night will be charged at the front desk, and provides for the following amenities: complimentary valet parking, use of the Westin Workout Gym, local phone calls and two bottles of water in each guest room.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: 1K BED:TRADITIONAL NON-SMOKING:1 KING:HEAVENLY BED AND SHOWER:WI-FI/HSIA INTERNET FOR A FEE

HotelSolution.name: Courtyard by Marriott Las Vegas Henderson/Green Valley

Content.hotel:Description: The Courtyard Henderson Hotel near Las Vegas is the perfect destination for both business and leisure travel. Our beautiful hotel in Henderson, NV is nestled among three of the world's most renowned man-made attractions: the Las Vegas Strip, the Hoover Dam and Lake Mead. Our convenient location on the south side of the Las Vegas area is the perfect escape after a busy day of exploring what the exciting Las Vegas Strip has to offer. Numerous dining options are available in walking distance and the hotel is conveniently just 3.5 miles from the Las Vegas McCarran International Airport (LAS). Guests can rest easy in our spacious rooms featuring luxury bedding, custom comforters, crisp linens and fluffy pillows. Those here on business appreciate a large work space, ergonomic chair and free high-speed internet access. Unwind by the outdoor pool, relax in the whirlpool or get a brisk workout in our on-site fitness center. Choose the Courtyard Henderson Hotel for your travel to the Las Vegas - Green Valley area.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: 1 King, sofabed, 331sqft 30sqm, living sitting area, wireless internet, complimentary, wired i nternet, complimentary, coffee tea maker, 42in

HotelSolution.name: Four Seasons Las Vegas

Content.hotel:Description: The Four Seasons Hotel Las Vegas is at the South end of the glittering Las Vegas strip yet is tucked away from the crowds and nonstop casino action. The hotel offers the best of both worlds - an oasis of tranquility and immediate access to the Mandalay Bay Resort and Casino. Spacious guest rooms are decorated in a elegant residential style and offer 42-inch plasma televisions, DVD player, and multi-line telephones. All have oversized marble bathroom with a deep soaking tub, separate shower stall, separate WC, terry robes and luxury bath amenities. The Four Seasons Hotel Las Vegas provides the added value of many complimentary amenities including use of fitness center complete with outdoor jacuzzi and eucalyptus steam room, complimentary use of exercise clothing and shoes, complimentary coffee service in our guest rooms as well as morning coffee in our lobby and spa, complimentary newspaper delivery, complimentary bottled water and chilled towels for joggers and complimentary use of hotel town car on a first come, first served basis within a 3 mile radius. The hotel offers superb cuisine, a sumptuous spa and an oasis swimming pool. Its location beside the Mandalay Bay Resort and Casino allows guests easy access to that resorts casino and recreational facilities. The Four Seasons Hotel Las Vegas offers a graciously intimate environment that will make any stay memorable.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: Standard room king mountains and desert view sitting area floor-to-ceiling windows max occ 3

HotelSolution.name: Polo Towers Resort

Content.hotel:Description:
In addition to an outdoor pool and a children's pool, Polo Towers Suites provides a health club, a spa tub, a steam room, and a fitness facility. The property provides wireless Internet access (surcharge). Polo Towers Suites also offers massage and treatment rooms and barbecue grills. The property has a 24-hour front desk. Onsite parking is complimentary. Enjoy the Las Vegas strip from your smoke-free fully equipped Studio, One Bedroom Condo or Two Bedroom Condo instead of a small hotel room! Our center strip location is directly across the street from world class shopping and dining at CityCenter. There is no need to rent a car because all of the 24 hour Las Vegas action is right outside your door. Our non-gaming property provides quiet relaxation. From our intimate rooftop outdoor pool and spa you can enjoy the stunning views. Children are invited to splash in the family water park play area. Need assistance deciding what to do next? Our concierge service will provide the latest information on all shows, events, tours and dining options. A full-service health club is nearby with special guest rates available.
A deposit of $250 will be taken at the front desk. Major credit card only no cash or debit cards accepted.
The fitness center at Polo Towers charges 1 Day = $5.00; 3 Day = $12.00; 7 Day = $20 per day/per person. Also guest must be at least 18 years of age to use the fitness center.
Please note that this property does not have daily maid service. However they do a daily towel exchange and trash pick up.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: Studio Suite - 1 murphy bed

HotelSolution.name: Holiday Inn Express LAS VEGAS - SOUTH

Content.hotel:Description: You'll Love Our South Las Vegas Hotel's Location The Holiday Inn Express Hotel Las Vegas South boasts an excellent location near some of the Silver State's most popular attractions, ranging from the thriving Las Vegas Strip to the classy Las Vegas Convention Center. Besides providing a Business Center for corporate travelers, our property includes a 696-square-foot meeting room, which is perfect for any type of event. Corporate travelers also appreciate our hotel's location in Las Vegas since we are near businesses like IBM, Pepsi and IGT, as well as the University of Nevada, Las Vegas. While in South Las Vegas, our hotel's guests can explore the bustling, energetic Las Vegas Strip or attend an event at the Las Vegas Convention Center. If you're in the mood for some area shopping, be sure to check out Town Square, home to several upscale store and restaurants. After a day at Town Square, unwind at the Fremont Street Experience or attend a race at the nearby Las Vegas Motor Speedway. We offer free Wi-Fi access throughout our hotel's accommodations, so while in Las Vegas, you can stay in touch with home. Be sure to stop by the complimentary, hot Express Start Breakfast Bar before beginning your day. Our hotel also has an on-site Fitness Center, as well as an outdoor pool, so you can soak up some sun anytime. In addition, we provide a complimentary area shuttle for your convenience. Let us help you plan your Las Vegas getaway!

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: 2 Queen beds nonsmoking - Advance Purchase Savings, nonrefundable

HotelSolution.name: Courtyard by Marriott Las Vegas Summerlin

Content.hotel:Description: The Courtyard by Marriott Las Vegas Summerlin Hotel offers guests the best of both worlds with our close proximity to the fabulous Las Vegas Strip and the rugged foothills of the Spring Mountains. Located near it all, our NorthWest Las Vegas hotel offers a new state-of-the-art lobby with flexible spaces to work or relax in, free Wi-Fi and easy access to the latest news, weather & airport conditions via the GoBoard. Grab a bite at The Bistro - Eat. Drink. Connect., which provides guests with a variety of breakfast offerings in the morning and dinner service with cocktails. Outdoor enthusiasts can enjoy hiking and climbing at nearby Red Rock Canyon. Just minutes away from our NorthWest Las Vegas hotel, the Las Vegas Strip offers world-class entertainment and dining. Take a break from your travels at our Las Vegas, Nevada hotel and relax beside our outdoor pool, soak in the whirlpool or get a brisk workout in our fitness center. Enjoy a new stay at the Marriott Courtyard NorthWest Las Vegas Hotel.

HotelSolution.name: Staybridge Suites LAS VEGAS

Content.hotel:Description: Guests Love Las Vegas Hotel's Great Views Characterized by urban sophistication, the Staybridge Suites Las Vegas hotel offers a convenient location just one-half mile from the Las Vegas Strip. The hotel's classic streamline design features rich wood and stone accents to please your senses with cosmopolitan style and a soothing ambiance. Enjoy breathtaking views of Las Vegas from each suite's curved limestone balcony with outdoor seating. Business travelers looking for Las Vegas, Nevada hotels near Nellis Air Force Base and the Las Vegas Convention Center need look no further. We keep you connected while you visit Las Vegas with the suite's free high-speed, wireless Internet access. When you need to depart from McCarran International Airport, you can ride our free shuttle. You can see some of the most exciting attractions in the area from the floor-to-ceiling windows in the suite's living room. Get to know the predators of the deep up close at Mandalay Bay's Shark Reef, just one-half mile away. The hotel's free shuttle also provides stress-free travel to the MGM Grand Casino. From the free, hot breakfast bar to the outdoor pool retreat with two whirlpools and cabanas, you'll feel pampered here at this Las Vegas, NV hotel's facility. If you need to unwind, enjoy a drink at the Sundowner Reception by one of the outdoor gas fire pits, or work off your stress in the on-site Fitness Center. Your stay becomes an experience when you visit us.

HotelSolution.name: La Quinta Inn & Suites Las Vegas Airport South

Content.hotel:Description:
The La Quinta Inn & Suites Las Vegas Airport South was recently named a 2012 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence award winner!
NEW! Samsung Flat-panel TVs with 30 channels of HD programming. Easy-access Plug-and-Play feature makes it simple to connect electronics.
The La Quinta Inn & Suites Las Vegas Airport South is located adjacent to Las Vegas McCarran International Airport (LAS). Our free airport shuttle runs 24-hours to and from the McCarran airport.
We offer five separate meeting facilities, a business center, free Internet (wireless and hard-wired) in every guest room. Unwind and relax in our outdoor pool & hot tub. For the motivated, enjoy a workout in our fitness center, Should it become necessary, you're welcome to feel even more at home by using our 24 hour guest laundry facility.
Enjoy our Free Bright Side BreakfastTM indoors or enjoy the fresh air while eating outside on the pool deck, complete with water-misters and fans. From fresh hot waffles to fresh fruit, eggs, cereals, etc, we offer a spread sure to please any palate.
Rooms at the La Quinta Inn & Suites Las Vegas Airport South are designed to fit nearly any mood and budget. We offer clean and comfortable rooms like our standard kings, two queen beds, king business suites, two-room king suites, or indulge in one of our luxurious spa suites. All rooms include European-style pillow-top mattresses, 37" or 42" flat screen television, satellite television, coffee makers, Wifi, hard-wired internet access, and much more. Our triple-paned windows and extra insulation help ensure a quiet night's sleep. Our rooms are guaranteed to be clean and comfortable.
We also cater to teams, schools, weddings, family reunions and groups of nearly any size. Our meeting facilities, in addition to our focus on "whatever it takes" guest service, will ensure you have a wonderful and successful gathering.

HotelSolution.name: SpringHill Suites by Marriott Las Vegas Convention Center

Content.hotel:Description: Welcome to the new SpringHill Suites Las Vegas, a new addition to the Las Vegas Convention Center hotels, where you'll have the space you need to get things done or unwind. Close to the Las Vegas Strip, our stylish and smartly designed Las Vegas Convention Center hotel suites are 25% larger than comparably priced standard hotel rooms, giving you room to succeed. SpringHill Suites Las Vegas is conveniently located within minutes from the Las Vegas airport (LAS). Looking for recreation close to your Las Vegas Convention Center hotel? With our central hotel location you can conveniently play all of Las Vegas' premier golf courses including Rio Secco, TPC Las Vegas, Bears Best and Bali Hai. After a day of golf stop by our SpringHill Suites Las Vegas Inspiration Lounge for a cocktail or lite meal or order room service. Premier dining is also a short walk or cab ride from our Las Vegas Convention Center hotel. Choose from the famous Piero's Italian, exotic RA Sushi or the renowned Capital Grill Steakhouse.

HotelSolution.name: Residence Inn by Marriott Las Vegas Convention Center

Content.hotel:Description: Our Residence Inn hotel near the Las Vegas Convention Center provides all the comforts of home right next to the heart of The Strip. Our Las Vegas all-suite hotel is within walking distance to the Convention Center, casinos, fine restaurants and shopping centers. Play a round of golf at the nearby Las Vegas National Golf Course or enjoy local activities including horseback riding, water-skiing and tennis. Whatever your Vegas vacation plans, enjoy a complimentary hot breakfast buffet in the morning and free snacks at our weekly managers reception. Our Las Vegas suites help you feel at home. Curl up in front of the fireplace or make yourself a meal in the fully equipped kitchen. Separate living and sleeping areas give you plenty of room to entertain guests or colleagues. Business travelers staying in our Las Vegas hotel suites will appreciate added amenities including a large well-lit desk and free high-speed Internet access. Refresh your travel routine at our Residence Inn Las Vegas Convention Center Hotel.

HotelSolution.name: Residence Inn by Marriott Las Vegas Hughes Center

Content.hotel:Description: Relax with all the comforts of home just a mile from the fabulous Vegas Strip at the Residence Inn Las Vegas Hughes Center hotel. During your stay, explore the Bellagio, Caesars Palace and all the other famous casinos on The Strip. Our Las Vegas extended stay hotel is located in the heart of "Restaurant Row" putting our guests within walking distance to over 20 restaurants. Our Las Vegas hotel suites help you maintain a balance of work and life as you thrive on extended stays. Each one of our specially designed Las Vegas suites offer separate living and sleeping areas, fully equipped kitchens and stylish furnishings. Our suites in Las Vegas are also equipped with 42" & 37" LG LCD TVs and free Internet access to keep you connected. Take full advantage of downtime and relax beside the pool or play on our sports court. And what would Las Vegas be without a complimentary breakfast buffet? Let the newly renovated Residence Inn Las Vegas Hughes Center become your favorite extended stay hotel in Las Vegas, Nevada.

HotelSolution.name: JW Marriott Las Vegas Resort & Spa

Content.hotel:Description: Experience one of the premier resorts in Las Vegas, the JW Marriott Las Vegas Resort & Spa. Our Las Vegas luxury resort is located in the heart of Southern Nevada's most prestigious collection of golf courses, boasting 50 acres of flourishing gardens, a resort pool with waterfalls and whirlpools, a lavish spa, and eleven restaurants, from fine dining to casual. Let our exclusive Golf Concierge schedule priority rounds at TPC Las Vegas or other nearby courses, indulge in soothing therapies at Aquae Sulis, our luxurious Las Vegas Spa & Salon, enjoy on-site gaming at Rampart Casino or explore the stunning landscape of nearby Red Rock Canyon. At the end of the day you can return to our North Las Vegas resort's deluxe guest rooms and exquisite suites with spectacular views, plush bedding and tech-friendly amenities. For guests planning a Las Vegas wedding, meeting or other event, our resort's amenities also include 100,000 square feet of state-of-the-art space, dedicated event managers and impeccable catering.

HotelSolution.name: Courtyard by Marriott Las Vegas South

We also surpass other South Las Vegas hotels in convenience with complimentary transportation to New York New York, Mandalay Bay/Convention Center and Town Square Las Vegas. Generous features at Courtyard Las Vegas Hotel South include free high-speed Internet access, state-of-the-art fitness center, pool & Whirlpool, 24-hour business center, 2,393 sq ft of meeting space and our Courtyard Cafe, which serves a healthy breakfast buffet, evening cocktails and dinner. At day's end our Las Vegas hotel rooms are a restful retreat, always freshly appointed and equipped for your needs: free Wi-Fi, well-lit work desk, mini-fridge and plush bedding. Welcome to the superior value-minded choice in hotels near the Las Vegas Strip.

Content.hotel:Description:
Just a quarter mile from The Vegas Strip, the Courtyard Las Vegas Convention Center Hotel provides a quiet, tranquil retreat. Start your day with our Vegas-style breakfast buffet then walk from your Las Vegas, Nevada hotel to the convention center across the street. Or a few minutes more to the casinos, restaurants and shopping centers of The Strip.

From there the express bus to the Fremont Street Experience leaves every 15 minutes. Two miles from your Las Vegas Convention Center hotel is the Las Vegas National Golf Course. Back in your Courtyard Las Vegas Convention Center hotel, your toughest decision is where to relax first. Try your over-sized guestroom with its fridge, coffee maker and luxury bedding.

Here to work? Find out why Courtyard by Marriott is known as the hotel designed for business travelers with your large, well-lit work desk and free high speed internet. All this and meeting rooms for your special event will make us your choice among Las Vegas Nevada hotels.

Content.hotel:Description:
NEW! Flat-panel TVs with 30 channels of HD programming. Easy-access Plug-and-Play feature makes it simple to connect electronics.
The La Quinta Inn & Suites Las Vegas Airport North Convention Center is located two miles north of McCarran International Airport and 1.3 miles from the fabulous Las Vegas Strip. We are three-fourths mile from the Las Vegas Convention Center, with over one million square feet of exhibition and convention space on one level and the adjacent Sands Expo Center. We are centrally located near all major Las Vegas venues and attractions.
Over 20 restaurants within walking distance of our hotel offer dining options for all variety of tastes. The University of Nevada Las Vegas is less than one mile east of our location, home of Thomas and Mack Arena and Cox Pavilion. There are over 40 private and public golf courses within driving distance of the hotel for as little as $7 or as much as $500, and on courses from rural to urban, you can find nine, 18, 27, or 36 holes.
Along with many standard amenities, our guests can relax by the sparkling outdoor heated pool and spa, or they can enjoy our fitness center. Microwave and refrigerator are in all guest rooms. Join us in the lobby for our Free Bright Side BreakfastTM each morning of your stay. Our courteous staff is here to ensure you have a pleasant stay.
We offer Stay and Go parking rates for our hotel guests.

HotelSolution.name: Candlewood Suites LAS VEGAS

Content.hotel:Description: Lady Luck won't fail you when you choose the Candlewood Suites Las Vegas. Our Las Vegas extended stay hotel's location and amenities make it the best choice for long or short term assignments and relocations. Professional and business guests in Las Vegas for an extended stay appreciate our hotel's outstanding features. We're one mile from McCarran Airport and the Las Vegas Convention Center. Our guests appreciate the free high-speed, Wi-Fi Internet access and over-size executive desks in each suite. After a day on the job, a suite seems more like home when you have a fully equipped kitchen and free laundry facilities. We respect your privacy so housekeeping is provided every seven days from the day you arrive. Pet friendly Las Vegas lodging at Candlewood Suites means the furry member of the family is as welcome to enjoy our suites as other family members. Our Vegas hotel's location is within walking distance of the terrific free attractions found along the world-famous Strip. The Grand Canyon and the Hoover Dam are close enough for a memorable day trip from our hotel in Las Vegas. Candlewood Suites Las Vegas offers amenities like spacious suites, an outdoor pool with Jacuzzi and a gazebo with gas grills. You can dine on home-cooking with a fully equipped kitchen or walk to dozens of nearby restaurants. Relax with a DVD from our library or enjoy a workout in the Candlewood Gym. Welcome home to the best of Las Vegas' extended stay hotels.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: Studio suite queen bed nonsmoking - Advance Purchase Savings, nonrefundable

HotelSolution.name: BEST WESTERN Main Street Inn

Content.hotel:Description:
Enjoy this Las Vegas hotel located only minutes from the Fremont Street Experience and three miles from the world-famous Las Vegas Strip.
The BEST WESTERN Main Street Inn offers easy access to major highways I-15 and I-93/95. This is the perfect property to stay at if you are attending an event at either Cashman Field Center or the Las Vegas Convention Center, visiting all of the attractions that make Las Vegas the Entertainment Capital of the World or simply driving through town and in need of a comfortable nights sleep.
Travelers with pets are always welcome at our property as we accept your furry friends with a nominal fee. Parking is always free and we have plenty of space for your oversize vehicle or charter bus.
La Piazza Restaurant & Bar is located on-site and adjacent to our lobby. The restaurant is well known for the Chicago style pizza and offers a full menu for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The bar, which has a sports bar theme, is open 24 hours daily and has 15 bar top gaming machines for your enjoyment. Daily specials are available in both the restaurant and bar and the warm staff will welcome you.
Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property so that you can catch up on work or surf the web for attractions and events happening while you are in Vegas. You can also use our business center computer and printer at any time of the day to print your boarding passes or reserve tickets for the hot shows in town.
Reserve your affordable accommodations at the BEST WESTERN Main Street Inn today!

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: 2 Queen beds,nsmoking,wireless hisp,cofmkr,iron, hairdryer

HotelSolution.name: Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites HENDERSON

Content.hotel:Description: Enjoy Comfort and Affordability in Henderson, NV Our hotel's Henderson, NV address is perfect for travelers needing to stay in the Las Vegas area. Since we're just 15 minutes from the flashy thrills of the Strip, guests don't miss a beat when staying at the Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites in Henderson, NV! We are one of the most conveniently located hotels in Henderson, and corporate guests can be at UNLV, ITT Technical Institute, 360 Communications and St. Rosa de Lima Hospital in just minutes. Along with perks like free hotel-wide, wired and wireless Internet access, we feature a Business Center with copy and print services and meeting space to accommodate 20. In town for the annual NASCAR, SEMA, MAGIC Marketplace or CES events? You can save money by booking one of our hotel's affordable rooms. Henderson, NV is close to a variety of memorable attractions. Explore the Hoover Dam, browse Galleria Mall or try your luck at Sunset Station Casino. Other great sites, including the Sam Boyd Stadium, Lake Mead, Montelago Village Resort and the District at Green Valley Ranch are a short drive from our hotel's convenient Henderson, Nevada address. In addition to a great location, we also feature tons of quality perks, like 101 well-appointed rooms with free Wi-Fi access, a well-equipped Fitness Center, complimentary parking and a free, hot Express Start Breakfast Bar. Indeed, our hotel's guests "Stay Smart" in Henderson, Nevada.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: 2 Queen beds nonsmoking - Advance Purchase Savings, nonrefundable

HotelSolution.name: Travelodge Las Vegas

Content.hotel:Description:
Our exterior corridor rooms allow you to quickly access your car and get where you are going, or you may instead choose to walk to one of the nearby casinos and attractions including the Convention Center, Circus Circus, Riviera, Sahara and the Stratosphere. Also, the Hoover Dam is less than an hour away.
We offer our guests a 24-hour front desk, free Wireless Internet in the Lobby, free parking, complimentary Grab and Go breakfast and an outdoor swimming pool. Our clean and comfortable rooms feature great amenities like telephone, hair-dryer, safe, and cable TV with Showtime/ESPN/CNN. We also have bus/motorcoach parking available for larger groups.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: 1 King bed non-smoking room with free grab and go breakfast, free wi-fi, coffee maker and hair dryer

HotelSolution.name: TownePlace Suites by Marriott Las Vegas Henderson

Content.hotel:Description: TownePlace Suites by Marriott is an extended stay Las Vegas/Henderson hotel offering views of the Las Vegas Strip, spacious studios, and one and two bedroom suites with separate living, work and sleep areas. Located just 10 miles from Las Vegas McCarran International Airport (LAS) and all the excitement of the Las Vegas strip, you can enjoy all the noise and excitement in nearby Las Vegas, with casinos galore and events like the SEMA show, and then come back to your clean and quiet Henderson guest suite. Each suite has a fully equipped kitchen with refrigerator, dishwasher and microwave. Business travelers will appreciate the well lit desk and complimentary high-speed internet. Vacationers can stay close and shop at the Galleria or go see a show at the Henderson Pavilion. From the town house exterior to the BBQ grill by the pool, everything about TownePlace Suites is designed to make you comfortable while you are away from home.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: 1 King, sofabed, fully equipped kitchen, microw ave, 400sqft 36sqm-800sqft 72sqm, living sittin g area, wireless internet, complimentary, wired

HotelSolution.name: Comfort Inn Airport

Content.hotel:Description: Only one mile from the famous Las Vegas Strip. Walking distance to quality shops and restaurants, across from the Hard Rock Cafe and Casino. Hotel shuttle available. One mile from the Las Vegas Convention Center. One mile from the airport. Three miles from downtown Las Vegas. Fitness center open 61m-9pm. 50.00 USD deposit for cash paying guests at check in. Pet accommodation - 25.00 per pet per night. Pet limit 1 pet per room maximum 15 pounds.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: 1 King bed no smoking kitchen coffee maker in room hair dryer

HotelSolution.name: Super 8 Las Vegas Strip Area

Content.hotel:Description:
The Worlds Largest Super 8 is centrally located one block from the Las Vegas Strip, just off of interstate 15. Award winning Ellis Island Casino and Brewery is located next door. Ellis Island features a restaurant, barbecue and Metro Pizza. The Worlds Largest Super 8 is AAA 2 diamond approved, featuring an abundance of amenities to make your stay more enjoyable. A 24 hour courtesy airport shuttle lets you skip the long cab lines at the airport. Features such as interior corridors, a 24 hour heated pool and spa, 4 HBO channels, free local and 1-800 calls, and coffee available 24 hours a day in the lobby and free wi-fi aid in making your stay convenient as possible.
Property does not participate in the SuperStart Breakfast program.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: 1 King bed non-smoking room

HotelSolution.name: Holiday Inn Express LAS VEGAS-NELLIS

Content.hotel:Description: Stay Smart at Our Hotel Near Nellis Air Force Base At the Holiday Inn Express hotel in Las Vegas, we make sure you have everything you need to enjoy your trip. Conveniently located outside Nellis Air Force Base, our beautiful accommodations offer comfortable amenities and professional service, perfect for all travelers. Our Las Vegas hotel's location is near several area businesses, including Boeing, SAIC, Bechtel, Western States and Frehner Construction. We are also close to North Beltway Business Park and Raceway Business Park. You can stay connected with great business amenities like free high-speed Internet access and a business center, and you're welcome to utilize the 850-square foot-meeting room, which is ideal for any events or meetings in Las Vegas. This hotel's close proximity to local attractions makes us the perfect choice for leisure travelers, as well. We are just three miles from the Las Vegas Motor Speedway, and we offer truck and RV parking at no extra charge. Guests will also find other popular attractions near our location, including the Las Vegas Strip, Sunrise Vista Golf Club and the Las Vegas Premium Outlets. During your stay, be sure to take advantage of all the conveniences available at our hotel in Las Vegas. Get an invigorating workout in our fitness center or enjoy a relaxing swim in the outdoor pool. And, in the morning, come to the lobby to try our complimentary Express Start Breakfast Bar.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: 2 Queen beds nonsmoking

HotelSolution.name: Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Las Vegas South

Content.hotel:Description: Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott far surpasses other hotels in south Las Vegas in convenience and everyday value for any guest. We're perfectly located just mile from the world-famous Las Vegas Strip and only 3 miles from McCarran International Airport, with convenient access to I-15 and 215 Beltway. Plus, enjoy free shuttle service from our hotel to the airport, Mandalay Bay, New York New York and Town Square Las Vegas. The exceptional value continues throughout your stay. Wake refreshed to our Early Eats free hot breakfast featuring Jimmy Dean breakfast sandwiches. Take advantage of free Wi-Fi, an extensive business center, exercise room and a refreshing outdoor heated pool and spa. When you're ready to turn in, our new Las Vegas hotel rooms and suites greet you with ample amenities and a clean, precise design conducive to rest. Get the value and service you deserve - make Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott your choice in south Las Vegas hotels near the Strip for absolutely any stay.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: 1 King, 380sqft 34sqm, wireless internet, compl imentary, coffee tea maker, 25in 64cm tv

HotelSolution.name: Fairfield Inn by Marriott Las Vegas Airport

Content.hotel:Description: The Fairfield Inn Las Vegas Airport hotel offers ultimate comfort, convenience and affordability and is among the top Las Vegas airport hotels. Near the Las Vegas Convention Center, we are also less than 5 minutes from the Sands Expo & Convention Center, the University of Nevada and the famous Vegas Strip. The Fairfield Inn Las Vegas Airport hotel is literally just 10 minutes from the Las Vegas International Airport and we are pleased to provide not only a free Las Vegas airport shuttle but also a free shuttle to and from the Vegas Strip. Our hotel offers excellent amenities, including plush bedding and modern conveniences. Take a dip in our outdoor hotel pool and visit our 24-hour fitness center. Our Las Vegas lodging also provides continental breakfast each morning and our signature Grab-and-Go breakfast, so you dont need to miss a single bit of Vegas excitement. If you want convenience, comfort and a hotel that is in the heart of all of the action, choose the Fairfield Inn Las Vegas Airport hotel!

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: 2 Double, mini-fridge, microwave, 282sqft 25sqm , wireless internet for a fee, coffee tea maker , 27in 69cm tv

HotelSolution.name: La Quinta Inn & Suites Las Vegas Summerlin Tech

Content.hotel:Description:
NEW! Flat-panel TVs with 30 channels of HD programming. Easy-access Plug-and-Play feature makes it simple to connect electronics.
The La Quinta Inn & Suites Summerlin Tech Center is in the beautiful Summerlin Community (TPC Golf, businesses, medical centers, including Mountain View Hospital and Sierra Health Services), and the Betty Wilson Soccer Complex.
Located on the northwest edge of the city with convenient Highway 95 access, it's a straight shot to the famous Las Vegas Strip, the Convention Center, and McCarran International Airport. From here it is easy to get to Lake Mead, Hoover Dam, Las Vegas Motor Speedway, UNLV's Thomas and Mack Center for concerts and other venues, and Lee Canyon Ski Resort and Mt. Charleston (30 degrees cooler in the summer than the city). Here for the shopping? Visit Fashion Show Mall and Las Vegas Outlet.
The La Quinta Inn & Suites Summerlin Tech Center provides spacious, clean rooms with lots of amenities; including free high-speed Internet access in all rooms, as well as deluxe king rooms with microwaves and refrigerators. We have meeting facilities and a refreshing outdoor swimming pool. Start your morning with our Free Bright Side BreakfastTM and free newspaper.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: Mobility accessible 2 full beds roll in shwr 32 inch hdtv free internet free breakfast coffeemaker iron hairdryer

HotelSolution.name: Eastside Cannery Casino Hotel

Content.hotel:Description:
The best new rooms on the Boulder Strip! Close to all the action and excitement you'll find your own quiet retreat in the clean, comfortable guest rooms at Eastside Cannery. Each room features wireless Internet, refrigerators, in-room movies and incredible views from the floor-to-ceiling windows.

The latest addition to the Cannery Casino Resorts family, Eastside Cannery Casino Hotel features 65,000 square feet of casino space housing 2,000 slot machines, 26 table games, a 400-seat bingo hall, a live keno lounge, a first-class poker room and a top-of-the-line race and sports book.

In addition to the casino, the Eastside Cannery also features 307 hotel rooms, five restaurants, an ultra-lounge atop the 16 story hotel tower (ONE SIX SkyLounge), three bars, an upscale live entertainment lounge, resort spa, Jacuzzi and a half-acre pool area complete with cabanas. For meeting planners, there's 20,000 square feet of ballroom and meeting space to service a variety of meeting and convention needs.

Located in the center of the casino floor, Pin-ups Bar features live entertainment six nights a week. Acts performing at Pin-ups are primarily a mixture of solo and duo groups, who perform many different genres of music. The genre may often be associated with a particular theme or promotion happening in the casino.

The pool is open seasonally and the hours are subject to change. Cabanas are available for rental.

PLEASE NOTE: A valid credit card is required at check-in for $75 security deposit and incidentals.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: Deluxe Room - 2 queen beds or 1 king bed

HotelSolution.name: Tuscany Suites and Casino

Content.hotel:Description:
Enjoy the beauty of Italy in Las Vegas, the most exciting city in the world. The Tuscany Suites & Casino, an all-suites resort with 600 square foot rooms, located one and a half blocks from the world famous Las Vegas strip. Situated on 27 acres of beautifully landscaped pools, fountains and winding pathways, the Tuscany Suites & Casino provides an exciting and beautiful atmosphere for conferences, conventions, business travel or simply a vacation. The Tuscany Casino is one of the newest in Las Vegas, with over 50,000 square feet featuring the newest video games, loose slots and a warm atmosphere at table games. Tuscany offers all of the comforts you would expect of a first class Resort and Conference Center, plus charm and affordability.

Check in 3pm Check out 11am. Tuscany does offer early check in for a fee, based upon availability.

A Resort Fee of $13 plus tax per night will be charged at the front desk. Resort fee includes: 2 for 1 entree at your choice of 2 restaurants, Cantina or Marilyn's Cafe; $20 food credit with $40 purchase at Tuscany Gardens; Match play coupon for the table games; Valet Parking, use of Fitness Center, In-room safes, Local Phone calls, In-room coffee, Internet throughout the reception building and convention public area; extra fee for internet use in suite. Coupons are received at time of check-in. Management reserves all rights to alter or change any resort fee at any time.

Tuscany requires a $200 cash or debit deposit or $100 authorization on your credit card at check in.

HotelRoom.RoomDescription: Suite - 2 double bed or 1 king bed

HotelSolution.name: Mandalay Bay

Content.hotel:Description:
Mandalay Bay Resort & Casino invites you to enjoy the ultimate blend of both entertainment and sophistication. It's the world of exotic luxury: 11 acres of beachside bliss, 135,000 square feet of casino, award-winning dining, luxurious spa relaxation, pillow-topped beds, a shark-themed aquarium and the ultimate in Vegas nightlife.

The recent $30 million poolside renovation showcases 2,700 tons of sparkling sand beaches lined with plush foliage, waterfalls, fountains and a wave pool. And with a lazy flowing river, upscale, "European-style" bathing at Moorea Beach club and private cabanas, the most sought-after poolside paradise in Vegas is at the Beach at Mandalay Bay.

Just footsteps from the crashing waves is the only waterfront gambling in the city: a glass-fronted, three-story beachfront casino. And inside, Mandalay Bay offers 135,000 square feet of gaming action. The casino was designed to make waves along the Strip with 120 gaming tables and 2,000 slot machines as well as race and sports wagering.

Mandalay Bay boasts some of Vegas' famous hot spots, including the dancers of Ivan Kane's Forty Deuce and the best view of the strip at Mix Lounge. Add edge-of-your-seat, championship boxing matches and on-your-feet musical headliners, and Mandalay's events are on the pulse of every entertainment option.

Mandalay Bay features imaginative cuisine for every palate: French delicacies, propelling wine angels, Hong Kong classics, even a frozen ice bar. From bold architecture and dazzling views to innovative dining and signature cocktails, Mandalay Bay's world-renowned kitchens are sure to cater to all your senses.

Mandalay Bay is also home to the Shoppes at Mandalay Place - a shopping experience filled with 38 shops and restaurants. Or, get face-to-face with some fascinating creatures at North America's only predator-based aquarium at Shark Reef Aquarium. And at the end of the day, the elegance and luxury of Mandalay Bay's newly remodeled rooms and suites awaits.

A resort fee of $20 plus tax per night will be charged at the front desk. The resort fee includes in-room wireless internet access as well as Cardio Center access, daily newspaper, local and 800 toll free calls, boarding pass printing, and outgoing fax services.

*** Guests must be 21 or older to check in. Maximum stay is 14 nights - Mandalay Bay will not honor a booking longer than 14 nights. ***

HotelSolution.name: MGM Grand Hotel and Casino

Content.hotel:Description:
Step through the doors of MGM Grand and begin an unforgettable "maximum Vegas" experience, where guests are pampered by a courteous staff and invited to play day and night at this AAA Four Diamond resort. Overlooking the famous Las Vegas Strip, MGM Grand features 5,044 elegant guest rooms and magnificent suites, all offering the very finest in amenities and personal service. Within its four 30-story towers, MGM Grand offers nine different kinds of rooms and suites to please any guest, from the Deluxe Rooms and Bungalow Suites to Celebrity Spa Suites and 2-bedroom Marquee Suites.

With state-of-the-art gaming technology, MGM Grand presents an unparalleled casino experience offering thousands of slots, video poker, and multi-game machines, including a 22-table Non-Smoking Poker Room open 24 hours a day, and daily tableside massage services performed by licensed massage therapists.

MGM Grand's Race & Sports Book boasts seating for 104 guests, 36 sixty-inch plasmas, 24 42" plasmas, six electronic display boards and 17 separate race and sports betting counters - in all, capable of receiving more than 30 channels of simultaneous action from all major international athletic and racing events. This is the first Race and Sports book in the industry to offer "Skyboxes" for its guests. Each of the four Skyboxes, ranging in size from 300 - 325 square feet, is equipped with the latest technology, offer a special second-level view, and can comfortably host eight to ten guests.

Showcasing the world's top performers and special events, MGM Grand has established itself as the world's premier entertainment destination. In KA by Cirque du Soleil, acrobatic performances, martial arts, puppetry and pyrotechnics are used to tell the epic saga of separated twins who embark on a perilous journey to fulfill their destinies. Direct from one of the finest nightspots in the world, MGM Grand's Crazy Horse Paris celebrates the beauty and sensuality of women. Witness sexy perfected as beautiful dancers combine sensuous choreography, stunning light displays, and film to portray the female form as art. MGM Grand's Hollywood Theatre attracts some of today's top entertainers including David Copperfield, while the Grand Garden Arena is home to concerts, championship boxing, nationally televised award shows and special events.

MGM Grand offers a number of exciting amenities and services including Concierge, tour packages, golf desk, and two full-service business centers, to name a few. A 6.6-acre pool complex featuring five swimming pools and a lazy river, the 30,000-square-foot Grand Spa offering treatments inspired by cultures from around the world, a salon by celebrity hair stylist Cristophe, the exciting daylife at Wet Republic Ultra Pool, diverse shopping and the Forever Grand Wedding Chapel complete this "Maximum Vegas" experience.

PLEASE NOTE: MGM Grand Las Vegas is in the process of enhancing the guest rooms and appreciates your understanding as they strive to improve your resort experience.

** Guest arriving at MGM Grand must be 21 years of age to check in. Guests under 21 will no longer be able to check in to this hotel. Maximum stay is 14 nights - MGM Grand will not honor a booking longer than 14 nights. **

A Resort Fee of $20 plus tax ($22.82) per night will be charged at the front desk. The resort fee includes: access to new Cardio Room; complimentary high speed Internet; $15 beverage credit per stay available at any MGM owned bar; daily newspaper USA Today available at Front Page newsstand; unlimited local and toll free calls; complimentary printing of boarding passes - Concierge or Business Center; Business Center Services - copies, faxes, and notary (limited).

HotelSolution.name: The LVH - Las Vegas Hotel and Casino

Content.hotel:Description:
** No Resort Fees! ** Discover a hidden gem within the City of Lights - elegant, spectacular, and delightfully tucked away - at The LVH. Experience the perfect reflection of our glittering surroundings from this newly redesigned Off-Strip Las Vegas hotel. Engage in infinite diversions, from premier casino gaming and exquisite restaurants to 200,000 square feet of meeting space and endless entertainment. Despite the impressive list of superlatives to our name, it is actually our intimate approach to service above all else that sets this beloved Las Vegas hotel casino destination apart as a truly special place.

Your key to fun in the sun begins atop the LVH's $18-million pool and recreation deck. Fully-stocked private cabanas, a world-class spa and fitness center, championship tennis courts, and the ever-popular Cabana Bar and Cabana shop place the LVH's pool and recreation deck in a class all its own. Pool operation seasonal; Spa and fitness center open year round.

Regis Signature Salon provides a full range of services including haircuts, color, highlights, manicures, pedicures, facials and make-up applications. Room Service offers a variety of amenities and specialty items, from light snacks and complete meals to flowers and chocolate-covered strawberries. Shopping includes The Jewelers, Kidz Clubhouse, the Manilow Store, Charisma, The Strip Store, and more.

Thirteen restaurants! From Mexico to Japan, and even into the 24th century, LVH offers a universe of delicious dining possibilities. Whether you delight in filet mignon, have a soft spot for creme brulee, are tempted by tempura or revel in the tastes of Italy, there's a restaurant to satisfy, enliven and even entertain your palate.

The LVH also boasts one of the best Las Vegas tennis clubs, complete with a pro shop and beginner and intermediate classes. Or, try out the Spa, located on the third floor recreation deck, which houses an indoor steam and sauna rooms and fitness equipment. Admission at our Las Vegas fitness center includes use of workout equipment, spas, steam rooms, robes, towels, sandals, lockers, safe deposit boxes, mineral water, juices, fruit, and all other amenities. Other features at our fitness center include personal training and classes in Yoga, Pilates, and Poolside Pump.

Choose from an extraordinary host of newly redesigned Off-Strip Las Vegas hotel rooms where fabulous amenities and thoughtful details ensure the height of comfort. Drift away to a restful, rejuvenating night's sleep in ultra-soft bedding. Stay connected with high-speed Internet access (for an additional fee) or dial up an in-room movie on the crystal-clear plasma TV. Take advantage of effortlessly affordable Las Vegas hotel room rates that deliver our unique brand of luxury at an exceptional value.
